thread.section_title: Alibaba.com 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 Alibaba.com 的点评意见 | www.alibaba.com
thread.title: Mei

author: Mei
title: Mei
text:
Alibaba cancelled my membership after I opened a few disputes for not receiving the items. What am I supposed to do? Pay and not get the item? There "buyer protection" is a joke. It is not meant to be protecting the buyer but the seller to get more shipping time. The item never come on-time and I received messages from Alibaba to advice me about "time is running out", then I opened dispute. But after I did it a few times now they cancel my account.
The product is cheaper than other places but the quality is very poor, specially the clothing items.
